title: Job Openings at Afripoint Group
content:
Afripoint Group is a leading technology solutions provider focused on delivering innovative products and services across various sectors. We are driven by a commitment to excellence and creativity, providing world-class solutions to our clients. At Afripoint Group, we value collaboration, forward-thinking, and a passion for pushing the boundaries of design to create exceptional user experiences.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) DevOps Engineer

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled DevOps Engineer to manage, automate, and optimize our infrastructure and deployment pipelines.
	The ideal candidate will ensure system reliability, scalability, and security across our fintech platforms and internal systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage and maintain cloud infrastructure (AWS/Azure/GCP)
	Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines
	Automate deployments and infrastructure using IaC tools
	Monitor system performance, availability, and security
	Collaborate with developers and DBA teams to support applications


Requirements


	3+ years of experience in a DevOps or Infrastructure role
	Strong knowledge of Linux systems
	Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools
	Hands-on cloud platform experience
	Good problem-solving and communication skills.


Application Closing Date: 17th February, 2026. 

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using "DevOps Engineer Application" as the subject of the mail.

 


2.) Database Administrator (DBA)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Afripoint Group Limited is seeking an experienced Database Administrator (DBA) to manage, secure, and optimize company databases, ensuring high availability, performance, and data integrity across business-critical systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Install, configure, manage, and monitor databases
	Perform regular database backups, recovery, and replication
	Ensure database security, integrity, and availability
	Optimize performance and resolve database-related issues
	Support development and operations teams with database needs


Requirements


	Minimum of 3–5 years of experience as a Database Administrator
	Strong knowledge of SQL and database platforms (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, or Oracle)
	Experience with database performance tuning and troubleshooting
	Familiarity with Linux/Unix environments
	Strong analytical and documentation skills


Certifications (Added Advantage):


	Oracle Certified Professional (OCP)
	Microsoft Certified: Azure Database Administrator
	AWS Certified Database – Specialty
	Any relevant database or cloud certification


Application Closing Date: 11th March, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using "Database Administrator (DBA) – Afripoint Group" as the subject of the mail.

 

 

3.) Personal Assistant to the Managing Director

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	Afripoint Group Limited is seeking a highly organized and proactive Personal Assistant to the Managing Director to provide administrative, scheduling, and confidential support to the MD.
	The ideal candidate must be detail-oriented, professional, and able to manage multiple priorities effectively.


Key Responsibilities


	Manage the MD’s schedule, meetings, and correspondence
	Handle confidential documents and information with discretion
	Coordinate travel, meetings, and internal communications
	Prepare reports, presentations, and meeting briefs
	Liaise with internal teams and external stakeholders


Requirements


	Proven experience as a PA or Executive Assistant
	Strong organizational and time-management skills
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	High level of professionalism and confidentiality
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office and productivity tools.


Application Closing Date: 10th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using "PA to MD Application – Afripoint Group" as the subject of the mail.

title: Job Vacancies at Crossover Microfinance Bank
content:
Crossover Microfinance Bank Limited was first incorporated under the name Pacific Savings and Loans Ltd in 1992. With a new focus and team in 2010 the bank was later rebranded Crossover Savings and Loans Ltd aka Crossover Mortgage Bankers. With the ever growing financial need in the retail sector and with new investors, Crossover remodeled its operations from mortgage to microfinance in 2014 to empower micro and small scale businesses in the retail sector. It commenced full scale microfinance operations in March 2016. Crossover Microfinance Bank Ltd is duly licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) and certified by NDIC with a paid up capital of N450 million. The bank currently has several branches with its head office located at 38 Kofoworola Crescent, Off Awolowo Way, Ikeja, Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the positions below:

1.) Software Test Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Create and maintain test plans and test cases based on software requirements.
	Execute test cases, log and track defects, and produce detailed test reports.
	Prepare and maintain project and product-related test documentation.
	Assist with code and documentation configuration management.
	Perform functional, system integration, and regression testing across web and mobile applications.
	Collaborate closely with developers, product managers, and operations teams to ensure quality delivery.
	Participate in requirement reviews, sprint planning, and Agile ceremonies.
	Provide regular test status updates and highlight quality risks to stakeholders.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or a related field, with 2+ years of software testing experience.
	Familiarity with common testing methodologies, testing tools, and defect tracking systems.
	Ability to perform functional testing and system integration testing; experience with performance or stress testing is a plus.
	Experience with configuration management tools (e.g., SVN).
	Understanding of software engineering principles and testing processes; system or acceptance testing experience is an advantage.
	Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development environment.
	Hands-on experience with manual testing; exposure to automation testing is an added advantage.
	Familiarity with testing tools such as JIRA, TestRail, Selenium, Postman, or JMeter (or similar tools).
	Basic knowledge of API testing and SQL queries is an advantage.


Application Closing Date: 14th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) System Operations Engineer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Responsibilities


	Maintain and support production environments and application systems, including monitoring, troubleshooting, and incident handling
	Perform application deployment, configuration, backup, and performance optimization
	Manage and monitor servers and middleware to ensure system stability, availability, and reliability
	Prepare and maintain operations documentation and operational reports


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science with 2 years of experience.
	Familiarity with major public cloud platforms such as Alibaba Cloud, AWS, and Tencent Cloud
	Strong proficiency in Linux systems (e.g., CentOS, Ubuntu)
	Experience working with Nginx, Tomcat, Redis, RabbitMQ, including performance optimization
	Basic understanding of JVM principles and performance tuning
	Proficiency in Shell and/or Python for operations scripting or automation
	Experience with large-scale operations platforms is an added advantage.


Application Closing Date: 14th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Sales Representative

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

About the Role


	We are looking for Online sales representative to communicate with potential customers through different means (WhatsApp, call, telegram, etc), convincing them to register, deposit, and use our platform.
	Your goal is to engage, persuade, and convert leads into active users through effective communication.


Key Responsibilities


	Engage potential customers via WhatsApp, calls, and social media chats.
	Explain the benefits of our platform and guide users through registration & deposit.
	Answer customer inquiries, clear doubts, and handle objections professionally.
	Track and follow up with leads to ensure successful conversion.
	Maintain a friendly, professional, and persuasive tone at all times.
	Meet and exceed weekly/monthly conversion targets.


Ideal Candidate


	Excellent communication skills (Written & Spoken English + Pidgin is a plus).
	Persuasive and sales-driven mindset with confidence in handling objections.
	Experience in customer service, sales, or telemarketing is a plus.
	Ability to work independently and meet targets.
	Familiarity with WhatsApp, Telegram, and social media chats for business.
	Interest in sports betting, casino, or fintech is an advantage.


Salary
N100,000 monthly.

Application Closing Date: 20th February, 2026.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: [email protected] using the Job Position as the subject of the
